Summary: 2 groups of 3 UFOs were observed travelling north to south, and then west, over Lake Michigan. When turning, they climbed and then disappeard.
divs: sighting detailswhile on our lake michigan west patio "hot air balloon" like objects travelled from north to south approximately 1-2 miles over lake michigan at an angle of about 30 degrees. there was no sound, no running\blinking lights. wind speed was 2mph, temp was 63 f with 75% humidity on a clear and cloudless night. three objects passed by our home, with intervals of about 1 minute, angled west toward chicago, and then climbed rapidly to a point where they disappeared from sight. 10 minutes elapsed, and the same event happened once again. i checked with our neighbor, a commercial pilot, and he reported he has seen the same thing, but with 4 objects flying in formation. i also checked with another neighbor, and he also observed an object. this same event occurred at our home on the evening of july 4th 2013, but with 2 groups of 2 travelling from the south to the north with the same flight patterns.
